statements: SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM restaurant_orders;
SELECT * FROM restaurant_orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM restaurant_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM restaurant_orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM restaurant_orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM restaurant_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM restaurant_orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM restaurant_orders;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM restaurant_orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM restaurant_orders;
SELECT customer_id, MIN(total_amount) AS min_amount FROM restaurant_orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS avg_total_amount FROM restaurant_orders;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount FROM restaurant_orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM restaurant_orders WHERE total_amount = (SELECT MAX(total_amount) FROM restaurant_orders);
SELECT customer_id, MIN(order_date) AS first_order_date FROM restaurant_orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM restaurant_orders WHERE customer_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001');
SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(total_amount) AS min_amount FROM restaurant_orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM restaurant_orders WHERE total_amount < 50;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM restaurant_orders WHERE order_date = CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM restaurant_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM restaurant_orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM restaurant_orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM restaurant_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(total_amount) FROM restaurant_orders;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) FROM restaurant_orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) FROM restaurant_orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(total_amount) > 500;
SELECT * FROM restaurant_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM order_date) AS month, SUM(total_amount) FROM restaurant_orders GROUP BY customer_id, month ORDER BY month;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM restaurant_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM restaurant_orders WHERE customer_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001');
SELECT * FROM restaurant_orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND total_amount > 50;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT order_date) AS unique_dates FROM restaurant_orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount FROM restaurant_orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MIN(total_amount) AS min_amount FROM restaurant_orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM restaurant_orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM restaurant_orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM restaurant_orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM restaurant_orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND total_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM restaurant_orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' OR total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM restaurant_orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;

SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_spent FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_id, MIN(total_amount) AS min_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, MIN(total_amount) FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING MIN(total_amount) < 500;

SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers RIGHT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customer_id, MAX(total_amount) AS max_order_amount FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING num_orders > 5;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_order_amount FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM order_date) AS order_year FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(order_date) AS latest_order_date FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, MIN(order_date) AS first_order_date FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_order_amount FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM order_date) = 1 GROUP BY customer_name;

SELECT customers.name, orders.order_date, order_history.status FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN order_history ON orders.order_id = order_history.order_id
SELECT customers.name AS customer_name, orders.order_date, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id
SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, c.name AS customer_name FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, COUNT(oh.order_history_id) AS total_updates FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id LEFT JOIN order_history oh ON o.order_id = oh.order_id GROUP BY c.name

SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_price) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, AVG(total_price) AS avg_order_price FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id HAVING AVG(total_price) > 500;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(total_price) AS max_order_price FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id HAVING MAX(total_price) > 1000;
